ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl

Class GlslProgramAttributeBufferVec4

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable, Managed<GpuShaderProgram>, Nameable, GpuShaderProgram.Attribute<java.nio.FloatBuffer>, GpuShaderProgram.Input<java.nio.FloatBuffer>, GpuShaderProgram.LocatableInput<java.nio.FloatBuffer>, GpuShaderProgram.StorageBuffer<java.nio.FloatBuffer>

    final class GlslProgramAttributeBufferVec4
extends AbstractGlslProgramAttributeBuffer
    An attribute buffer of 4-component floating-point vectors, as expected by a GLSL shader program.

    This is intended for GLSL vec4 types with the in type qualifier.

    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera
